title: SuperFocus | Advanced Orthomolecular Research | AOR
description: SuperFocus offers a balanced combination of botanicals & vitamins to both stimulate and calm the mind. Supports concentration & energy.

The ingredients in SuperFocus help support brain function and mental stamina.* AOR guarantees that all ingredients have been declared on the label. Made without wheat, gluten, nuts, peanuts, sesame seeds, sulfites, mustard, soy, dairy, eggs, fish, shellfish or any animal by-product. Take one to two capsules daily with or without food, or as directed by a health care practitioner. To reduce the chance of side effects, start with one capsule and gradually increase to the effective dose. For occasional use only. Consult a health care practitioner for use beyond three months. Do not mix, crush capsules. Swallow capsules you are pregnant, breastfeeding, have a medical condition (high blood pressure, as ephedrine).
